title: Russian Actions Intensifying Syrian Civil War, Carter Says (US Department of Defense)
text: ( Source : US Department of Defense ) WASHINGTON, September 30 , 2015 - Russian actions are intensifying the instability in Syria and making the civil war there more vicious, Defense Secretary Ash Carter said here today. During a Pentagon news
